alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 04 at 3:40PM EST until January 07 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Warren and Morris. In Pennsylvania, Northampton. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest snow amounts across these areas will be limited to northern portions of Northampton County, northern Warren County and northern Morris County. Southern portions of each county will range around 2-5 inches. Snowfall may be heavy at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
